name: Yogscast Gift Cats
description:
Made for the Yogscast Game Jam 2019

In this game you and a friend play as cats (who look somewhat familiar?) And your goal is to meet in the centre of the map and trade gifts. You must then both make it back to your starting areas so you can open them on christmas day!

To use controllers, connect one for each player then start the game. Wireless controllers work too!
